titles.title: Providing for an adjournment of the House from Thursday, October 7, 1993 or Friday, October 8, 1993 to Tuesday, October 12, 1993 and adjournment or recess of the Senate from Thursday, October 7, 1993 to Wednesday, October 13, 1993.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 10/7/1993--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from October 7 or 8, 1993, until October 12, 1993, and a recess or adjournment of the Senate from October 7, 1993, until October 13, 1993.
